contentrichtext.text: {{for|the airport serving Cooma, Australia, assigned the ICAO code YCOM|Cooma – Snowy Mountains Airport}} '''Yokohama Commodity Exchange''' (Y-COM) was a [[futures exchange]] based in [[Yokohama]], [[Japan]] which operated from 1998 to 2006. == History == The exchange was formed in 1998 from the merger of the [[Yokohama Raw Silk Exchange]] ([[:ja:横浜生絲取引所|横浜生絲取引所]]) and the [[Maebashi Dried Cocoon Exchange]] ([[:ja:前橋繭糸取引所|前橋繭糸取引所]]).<ref name="ycom">[http://www.y-com.or.jp Yokohama Commodity Exchange web site], as at 2005 (site now gone)</ref> As of 1 April 2006 the exchange merged into the [[Tokyo Grain Exchange]] ([[:ja:東京穀物商品取引所|東京穀物商品取引所]]),<ref>[http://www.tge.or.jp/english/about/about_02.shtml Exchange History page] at the [[Tokyo Grain Exchange]] (as at May 2006)</ref> with [[silk]] and vegetables contracts moved there. The exchange's closure was due to declining trading volumes.<ref>[http://www.bloomberg.com/apps/news?pid=10000080&refer=asia&sid=aVvZpCczT0Uc Japan's Commodities Exchanges Falter as Internet Trades Surge] by Hector Forster and Fumishige Asanogold, [[Bloomberg L.P.|Bloomberg]] news, 27 April 2006</ref> Although 2005 and 2006 were boom times in commodity speculation in other areas like oil and metals, that action didn't extend to Yokohama. Y-COM's end as a separate organisation was another in an ongoing consolidation of exchanges in Japan. In 1983 for instance there were 19 regional exchanges, with the closure of Y-COM there remained only 6. == Operations == Trading was conducted in an "[[Itayose]]" auction-like system.<ref name="ycom"/> There were four sessions each day, in which a single price was established for each contract month for each commodity. Commodities traded were * [[Potatoes]] — Japanese produced [[Dansyaku]] size "L" * Japanese raw [[silk]] — 27 [[denier (measure)|denier]] 3A produced in Japan * [[Vegetable]]s — cash settled average of several vegetable prices In the past dried [[Pupa#Cocoon|cocoons]] were traded. == References == <references/> == See also == * [[List of futures exchanges]] [[Category:Commodity exchanges]] [[Category:Yokohama]] {{Japan-company-stub}}
